title: Billy Eichner | NY AG’s Bombshell Lawsuit Accuses Trump of Staggering Fraud, Seeks $250M: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at New York Attorney General Letitia James suing Trump over allegations of staggering fraud and a special master chastising Trump's legal team during a hearing on the classified Mar-a-Lago documents.

Then, Billy Eichner talks about doing Billy on the Street with Paul Rudd for the first time in three years, filming Bros on a controlled set in New York City and his half brother having to watch his sex scenes in the film.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
